src:
Duarte makazicama ostavio Arsenal bez pobede u Portugaliji [VIDEO]
06 Nov 2019, 18:53 by Milos
Vitorija Gimaraeš – Arsenal 1:1 (0:0)Duarte 90+1′ – Mustafi 80′
Fudbaleri Arsenala ispustili su priliku da ostvare četvrtu uzastpnu pobedu u F grupi Lige Evrope.
„Tobdžije“ su na gostovanju u Portugaliji vodili protiv Vitoriju Gimaraeš do samog finiša, ali su domaći u sudijskoj nadoknadi stigli do prvog boda.
Strelac gola za Arsenal bio je Škodran Mustafi 10 minuta pre kraja susreta, ali je Bruno Duarte u 91. minutu fantastičnim golom postavio konačnih 1:1.Arsenal je prvi na tabeli sa 10 bodova. Drugi je Ajntraht sa 6, treći Standard sa 3, dok je Vitorija upisala prvi poen.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Duarte leaves Arsenal without a win in Portugal [VIDEO]
06 Nov 2019, 17:53 by Milos
Vitoria Guimaraes - Arsenal 1: 1 (0: 0) Duarte 90 + 1 ′ - Mustafi 80 ′
Arsenal fans missed the opportunity to win their fourth consecutive F Europa League victory.
The "Tobdjis" led away against Vitoria Guimaraes in the away game in Portugal, but the home team in the judges' compensation reached the first point.
The goal scorer for Arsenal was Shkodran Mustafi 10 minutes before the end of the match, but Bruno Duarte put the final goal 1: 1 in the 91st minute. Arsenal was first on the table with 10 points. The second is Eintracht with 6, the third Standard with 3, while Vitoria registered the first point.
